sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Deletes Attachment associated with the provided Attachment ID.

Inputs :

    • Attachment ID - Unique ID of the attachement.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Microsoft Exchange Server, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Invalid Credentials.

To use this action, the corresponding Microsoft Exchange Server connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Exchange Server Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Deletes Attachment associated with the provided Attachment ID.

Inputs :

    • Attachment ID - Unique ID of the attachement.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Microsoft Exchange Server, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Invalid Credentials.

To use this action, the corresponding Microsoft Exchange Server connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Exchange Server Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
